main event: A summary of information dated 10 July 1950 reports an unidentified object sighted over Fort McPherson, Georgia by the 111th CIC Detachment.
interesting points: The object appeared small with a bright metallic appearance.
It was flying in a northeasterly direction at an unpredictable high altitude.
The object was later obscured by low hanging clouds.
The sighting was reported to the OSI in Marietta, Georgia immediately.
The report was downgraded at 3-year intervals and declassified after 12 years as per DOD DIR 5200.10.
